message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will bring significant value to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your offer. However, I'm looking to acquire this product for a slightly lower price point. Considering the value it holds for you, I'm willing to offer $1250000. This price is within your desired range, while still allowing me to secure a good deal. I'm open to further discussion if needed.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to get closer to the value I have in mind. Considering the product's worth to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a new price of 1275000. This is a fair compromise that should satisfy both of us.
